alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:29AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Colfax, northwestern Seward, Butler and northwestern Saunders Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 729 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Schuyler to 5 miles northeast of Rising City to 5 miles northwest of Gresham. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... David City and Schuyler around 735 AM CDT. Brainard, Ulysses, Bruno, Linwood and Abie around 745 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Staplehurst, Prague, Dwight and Bee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
